leftMenu.writeUsDesc: If you have any service problems

about.privacyText:
Inspiring pleasures from Les Ailes
If the history of the creation of the Les Ailes network did not exist, it would definitely have to be invented. This is an amazing example of commercial success intertwined with people's love, reverent attitude to national gastronomic traditions and progressive European technologies. Les Ailes is more than just fast food. Rather, it is a mix of bistronomy, which is incredibly fashionable today, and reference cafes for fast and healthy food.
Translated from French, Les Ailes means “wings” and sounds like “liesel”, but from the very first days of its existence, the brand was so treated with love by guests that it immediately turned into “Les Ailes”, becoming a symbol of inspiring success and what it was for. come with the whole family or in the company of friends - the juiciest breaded chicken.
Unlike fast food restaurants, where the menu is based on ready-made food, everything is much more complicated in Les Ailes: they create dishes from blanks, that is, the cooking process takes longer, which guarantees the original freshness of the products and the absolute authenticity of tastes.
Chicken wings, nuggets, balls and strips, chicken cheese, burgers and longers, vegetable salads, cheesecakes, soups and desserts - everything served at Les Ailes is the result of numerous travels around the world, acquaintance with different cuisines, selection of first-class products and reliable suppliers, compositions of outstanding author's recipes.
Well, the commercial success of the Les Ailes network, owned by the Havoqand People group of companies, and the loyalty of guests are most eloquently spoken by the numbers. For 8 years of work, the network has grown to 15 branches, went beyond the borders of Uzbekistan. In 2021, the Les Ailes brand launched a franchise and opened its first outlet in Kazakhstan. Les Ailes also became the first network in Uzbekistan to launch a Telegram bot for delivery. Such automation allows today to fulfill about a thousand orders per day.
